summary: An assassin is sent to kill the witness from testifying against the killers. In the process, the assassin falls in love with the witness.
cast: Sanjay Dutt|Manisha Koirala|Sharad S. Kapoor|Simran|Mukesh Khanna|Suresh Oberoi|Tinnu Anand|Jaspal Bhatti|Farida Jalal|Parmeet Sethi|Navin Nischol|Beena Banerjee|Ishrat Ali|Achyut Potdar|Satyendra Kapoor|Rajesh Joshi|Homi Wadia|Dinesh Hingoo|Dinesh Anand|Brij Gopal|Daler Mehndi|Raveena Tandon|Chandrashekhar
title: Khauff
